text:
Question 144) Flu is a short -term acute respiratory infection caused by influenza virus. Upon entering our body through the nose, this virus multiplies, spreading to the throat and other parts of the airways, including the lungs.
The influenza virus is a spherical particle that has an internal diameter of 0.00011 mm.
In scientific notation, the internal diameter of the influenza virus, in mm, is
A) 1.1 × 10-1
B) 1.1 × 10-2
C) 1.1 × 10-3
D) 1.1 × 10-4
E) 1.1 × 10-5
